casebody.data:
IN RE: T.N.H. 92A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2019 Mercedes O. Chut, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Brewington, Lillie. Roger A. Askew, Senior Deputy County Attorney, Mary Boyce Wells, Senior Assistant County Attorney, for Wake Co. Dept of Human Services. Katherine A. King, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2019 by Respondent-Mother to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of April 2019."
